channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP EPM Add-in for Microsoft Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP EPM Add-in for Microsoft Office

item.title: CVE-2021-21470|2024-08-03T18:16:22.407Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20epm%20add-in%20for%20microsoft%20office
item.description: SAP EPM Add-in for Microsoft Office, version - 1010 and SAP EPM Add-in for SAP Analysis Office, version - 2.8, allows an authenticated attacker with user privileges to parse malicious XML files which could result in XXE-based attacks in applications that accept attacker-controlled XML configuration files. This occurs as logging service does not disable XML external entities when parsing configuration files and a successful exploit would result in limited impact on integrity and availability of the application.
